about_the_game:
HISTORY

Does everyone deserve forgiveness? And who has the right to decide the fate?

In the horror "The LIK" you have to try on the role of a father who came to a mysterious abandoned temple with the last hope of saving his daughter. But the temple turns out to be not so simple and empty, however, like the main character - so now not only the girl needs salvation.
By exploring locations and collecting notes, you will be able to make the right decision when you need it...

WHO IS THIS GAME INTENDED FOR

This game is for those who love reading, psychological thrillers and dark atmospheric stories.

GAMEPLAY

Explore the temple and collect notes, revealing through them the stories of the characters to make a decision on which not only your life will depend.

CHARACTERISTICS OF THE GAME

  • Fascinating storyline: immerse yourself in the emotional dramas of the characters of the story and the events taking place in the temple.

  • Explore an abandoned temple in search of your daughter, keeping your mind and emotions under control. You don't know who and what you can trust, do you?

  • "The LIK" is a horror. So be ready to plunge into inexplicable and frightening events that will change the fate of the characters.

  • Are you sure you can trust at least your eyes? Carefully study all the text that you see. Remember that only concentration and intuition will help you get home.

short_description: Your daughter is sick. Hoping to alleviate her condition, you go to a distant temple. But your daughter disappears, your mind too, and the inhabitants of the church are not in the best mood for you. Will you be able to learn all the secrets of the Temple and get out of there alive?
